def async_cron_task(app):
with app.app_context():
while True:
new_user = User.query.order_by(User.reg_time.desc()).first()
print('New User: ', new_user.id)
time.sleep(3600)
def cron_task():
app = current_app._get_current_object()
thr = Thread(target=async_cron_task, args=[app])
thr.start()
return thr
